rooms.description: An open-plan living and kitchen space that embodies a Bohemian aesthetic with vibrant textures and eclectic decor. It features ample natural light through large windows adhering to Vastu principles of east-west orientation.

Spacious bedroom for the bachelor pad, designed with a Bohemian farmhouse vibe. Includes an integrated balcony that overlooks a lush garden area, ensuring good ventilation and privacy in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Modern bathroom incorporating sustainable fixtures and warm, natural hues complementing the Bohemian farmhouse theme. Positioned as per local building norms to optimize water flow and drainage.

openings.description: Large east-facing window ensuring abundant natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.
Main entrance door designed for easy access and aligning with the Vastu guideline of auspicious entry.
